resources.string: "Best\'s Board is a completely configurable hexagonal soft-keyboard." "It uses plain text files to describe layouts."
"Descriptor text files are located on the external storage (sd-card) to be easily editable. " "Best\'s Board will use only the working folder. " "Please, grant permission to the data storage!"
Enter system settings \n to grant external storage access!
"Best\'s Board (as all soft-keyboards) should be enabled in system settings. " "Best\'s Board DOES NOT store any keystrokes or any typed information, not even within the developer logs."
Enter system settings to \n enable BestBoard input method!

"Best\'s Board is easy to use! Select a predefined layout, and start typing! " "You can modify layouts or create Your own layout.
